components.name: Box Web Application
components.description: The primary Box web-based application from which customers can access content, collaborate, and perform other workflow-related functions.

components.name: Content Preview
components.description: Functionality to Preview Content in the Box Web Application, Mobile Clients, and View API.

components.name: Box Drive
components.description: Access to Box through Box Drive

components.name: Partners / Integrations
components.description: This is a catch-all for third-party and Box supported integrations. While we often don't have direct control over third-party apps, we will report impactful issues about them.

components.name: Developer Console / Docs (developer.box.com)
components.description: The primary web portal to both our developer documentation and access to manage Platform application scopes and related configurations.

components.name: FTP
components.description: The ability to upload or download content from Box from an FTP client.

components.name: Box Website
components.description: The primary Box marketing website which includes information about available products and services. This site also serves as the beginning destination for a customer's login to the Box Web Application and default download links to desktop and mobile client software.

components.name: Watermarking
components.description: Watermarking feature in Box Web App

incident_updates.body: Starting Saturday, April 20th at 8:00 AM PDT until 12:00 PM PDT, Box will be conducting the first of two Resiliency Testing phases, which may result in a brief service degradation.  As a result of this testing, we aim to update and enhance our recovery capabilities, ultimately improving the user experience and providing a smoother, more efficient platform by ensuring the reliability and resiliency of our services.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and greatly appreciate your understanding as we strive to enhance our services.  Any additional updates will continue to be shared through our status site until this maintenance is complete.  If you require any additional assistance during this maintenance, please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com.

Starting Saturday, April 20th at 8:00 AM PDT until 12:00 PM PDT, Box will be conducting the first of two Resiliency Testing phases, which may result in a brief service degradation.  As a result of this testing, we aim to update and enhance our recovery capabilities, ultimately improving the user experience and providing a smoother, more efficient platform by ensuring the reliability and resiliency of our services.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and greatly appreciate your understanding as we strive to enhance our services.  Any additional updates will continue to be shared through our status site until this maintenance is complete. If you require any additional assistance during this maintenance, please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com.
